hero.name: M Safwan Yasin
hero.description: I am passionate about creating experiences that are engaging and user centric. Currently hunting for roles in software, frontend and mobile app development, I bring a blend of creativity and technical skills. Check out my portfolio for a glimpse of my passion in action!

about.title: I'm a developer based in Istanbul, Turkey
about.description: While pursuing a degree in Computer Science from Sabanci University, I am also working as a freelance application, software and web developer. Since, I am in my last semester, I'm actively searching for job opportunities, both remote and onsite. I am willing to relocate if needed.

work.title: Selected Work
work.description: An overview of some of the projects I have worked on. Visit my Github to see more!

allProjects.name: TaleTuner - A Bookkeeping and AI Story Generation App built using DDD
allProjects.description:
TaleTuner is an application that utilizes the Google Books API to act as a search engine for books. It allows you to search for books, view their detailed information and then add them to your reading list or wishlist. Furthermore, it uses the Gemini API to generate short stories based upon customized prompts entered by the user.
 The most notable feature of this application is that it was created using Flutter Domain Driven Design (DDD). DDD breaks down your application into 4 layers, namely: Domain, Application, Infrastructure, and Presentation. This allows for modularity and scalability within the application.
 Feel free to contact me if you wish to learn more about the power of Domain Driven Design!

In a future project, I also converted this application into a cloud application where all the backend was hosted on Google Cloud Platform. The backend utilized a microservices architecture. Each microservice ran on a dedicated cloud function with load balancers put in place for each of them to prevent overloading.

allProjects.name: Moqah.pk - Pakistan's first event finding platform
allProjects.description: Moqah.pk is Pakistan's first event finding platform. Currently, in its development phase, it is set out to be a platform that would allow users to search and register for all kinds of events across Pakistan - from online seminars to concerts.

allProjects.name: NottACafe - A Food Ordering App
allProjects.description: NottACafe is a food ordering application that I built for a client for their university. The application allows you to sign up as a customer or a vendor, thus effectively allowing you order or sell food. It has a user-friendly interface with features like the ability to order food for instant or scheduled delivery, a beautiful light and dark theme, and much more! The app  was built using Flutter and utilizes providers for state management.

allProjects.name: Lightbulb - An Educational Social Media App
allProjects.description: This app holds a special place in my heart since it was the first mobile application I created. LightBulb is an educational social media application that aims to transform the time you spend on social media into a learning experience. It allows users to create posts while also adding relevant tags for each post, watch and react to other users' posts and much more!

allProjects.name: Graduation Project - A prototype for a self following luggage platform
allProjects.description: As part of my graduation project at Sabanci University, my groupmates and I developed a prototype for a self following luggage platform that would follow its owner. The hardware for the platform was designed by my groupmates and I was responsible for desgining the software for the system. The project combines aspects of machine learning and computer vision to enable the robot to follow its owner based on the input from a stereoscopic camera.

allProjects.name: GameHub - An e-commerce web application for purchasing games
allProjects.description: GameHub is an e-commerce web application designed for purchasing games. It alows you to sign up as a customer or a vendor thereby allowing you to buy or sell games on the platform. The vendor side is accompanied by a complete admin dashboard that allows you to manage and track your sales, order more games that are out of stock from the warehouse etc. It provides users with the ability to buy games for multiple platforms, order tracking and a lot more. The web application was built using the Vue.js framework.
